argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvmeq0.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvmeq0.3 | |- M = ( -v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvmeq0.5 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_nvmcl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A M B ) e. X ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( A M B ) e. X ) |
| 6 | 1, 3 | #P_nvzcl | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> Z e. X ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> Z e. X ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> B e. X ) |
| 9 | 5, 7, 8 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( A M B ) e. X /\ Z e. X /\ B e. X ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( +v ` U ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_nvrcan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( ( A M B ) e. X /\ Z e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( ( A M B ) ( +v ` U ) B ) = ( Z ( +v ` U ) B ) <-> ( A M B ) = Z ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( ( A M B ) ( +v ` U ) B ) = ( Z ( +v ` U ) B ) <-> ( A M B ) = Z ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3impb | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( ( A M B ) ( +v ` U ) B ) = ( Z ( +v ` U ) B ) <-> ( A M B ) = Z ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 10, 2 | #P_nvnpcan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A M B ) ( +v ` U ) B ) = A ) |
| 15 | 1, 10, 3 | #P_nv0lid | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ B e. X ) -> ( Z ( +v ` U ) B ) = B ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( Z ( +v ` U ) B ) = B ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( ( A M B ) ( +v ` U ) B ) = ( Z ( +v ` U ) B ) <-> A = B ) ) |
| 18 | 13, 17 | #P_bitr3d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A M B ) = Z <-> A = B ) ) |
